details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a mine. It was eventually abandoned by its creators, and the dungeon has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.

hidden_treasure: Locked Good Wooden Chest (DC 25 to unlock, DC 20 to break; 15 hp)

41000 gp, 31000 pp, a drake hide belt tooled with draconic scales (2500 gp), a drake hide vest sewn with platinum (2500 gp), a fine leather scabbard tooled with arcane runes (2500 gp), a fine porcelain bowl gilded and painted with an ancient coat of arms (2500 gp), a gold amulet inlaid with ornate orichalcum scrollwork (2500 gp), a gold rapier set with diamond and jacinth (2500 gp), a jet scepter set with a single black sapphire (2500 gp), a platinum bell engraved with mythical creatures (2500 gp), a velvet robe threaded with platinum (2500 gp), an electrum censer engraved with elven script (2500 gp), +3 Ammunition (20 sling bullets) (very rare, dmg 150), Spell Scroll (Heroes' Feast) (very rare, dmg 200), Potion of Flying (very rare, dmg 187), 2 x Potion of Invisibility (very rare, dmg 188), Potion of Supreme Healing (very rare, dmg 187)

wandering_monsters.1: Lamia (cr 4, mm 201) and 11 x Jackalwere (cr 1/2, mm 193); hard, 2200 xp, tracking the party

wandering_monsters.6: 13 x Firenewt Warrior (cr 1/2, motm 125, vgm 142); medium, 1300 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
